definition: marked by eagerness to resort to violence and bloodshed
details:
adjective
- marked by eagerness to resort to violence and bloodshed
= example: marked by eagerness to resort to violence and bloodshed
= synonyms: bloodthirsty
- stubbornly obstructive and unwilling to cooperate
= example: stubbornly obstructive and unwilling to cooperate
= synonyms: cantankerous
